does_table_exist[source]

does_table_exist(bq_client, table_id)

Check if table exists in BigQuery.

{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
# tests
bq_client = bigquery.Client()
assert does_table_exist(bq_client, 'bigquery-public-data.samples.shakespeare') == True
{% endraw %}
